answers.answer: I'm having a similar problem. My doctor said it could be something I'm eating. She had me stay away from things with natural complex sugars like oranges and fruit juices just to see if it changed anything and it did. I can still eat the stuff it's just now I know why there was sugar in my urine.
See I cut out the juice as much as I can but im still leaking sugar, my dr doesn't seem to be very worried so im trying not to be either. It just hard not to.
I understand. As long as your blood work is normal, you should be fine mama.

question: So my dr. Thought I had gestational diabetes when I was just 10wks now im 35wks and can't understand why I leak sugar this badly in my urine.  I took the 3hr test and it came out normal I've done blood tests all normal, but yet I still leak sugar as if I do have diabetes,  with my due date drawing ever near im very worried that I've hurt my unborn son some how?
title: leaking sugar
